catalog_script_client.name: Autofill information onChange

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_463a1fa0472731107b748a5f746d4390
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Autofill information onChange</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    if (newValue === '') {
        g_form.clearValue('phone');
    }

    var gaPhone = new GlideAjax('GetUserProperties');
    gaPhone.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getPhone');
    gaPhone.addParam('sysparm_user', newValue);
    gaPhone.getXMLAnswer(_handleResponse);

    function _handleResponse(response) {
        var answer = response;

        g_form.setValue('phone', answer);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-02 13:07:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>463a1fa0472731107b748a5f746d4390</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autofill information onChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_463a1fa0472731107b748a5f746d4390</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-02 13:16:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Requester Information">735f5ab3474331107b748a5f746d43e7</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
